replies.body:
#A Corporate Matter
**Episode: _PlayerCorporate's Battlegrounds, Part 1_**

{{champion:150}} _"Wakes up in a dimly lit warehouse."_ "Huh, where am I?"

{{champion:64}} "Gnarly, is that you?"

{{champion:150}} "Yeah, what's going on."

{{champion:64}} "I don't know. Last thing I remember. I was in my house when I heard footsteps on my roof. Then there was a very loud noise and I woke up here."

{{champion:75}} "My head hurts."

{{champion:150}} "Corporate Nasus, you're here too? I swear, if our boss has anything to do with this I'm going to-"

{{champion:36}} "Quiet, Corporate Mundo trying to sleep."

{{champion:201}} "He appear to be innocent."

{{champion:36}} "Corporate Mundo not innocent a day in life."

{{champion:150}} "What, are we all here?"

{{champion:10}} "Yeah."

{{champion:236}} "Unfortunetly."

{{champion:240}} "_Badgers, I'm gonna kill all the badgers._ Huh? **WHERE AM I, WHERES MY SKAARL? I'M GOING TO KILL YOU ALL!**"

{{champion:72}} "Would you Corporates shut up. I am sure our kidnappers will explain everything soon."

{{champion:91}} "Screw that, I am going to parkour up those shelves there and out that window."

{{champion:266}} "Yeah, not sure that's a great idea. They probably have some security measure."

{{champion:91}} "Then I'll evade that too."
_"Begins to jump up the shelves."_

{{champion:267}} "He's actually going to make it."

{{champion:91}} "Hahahaha, and you said I couldn't ma-"
_"Head explodes."_

{{champion:81}} **"AHHHHHHH, OH DEAR RITO, PLEASE HAVE MERCY ON ME!!!!"**

_**A mysterious voice suddenly booms throughout the warehouse.**_

{{item:3194}} "Oh dear, I was hoping that we could avoid that this time."

{{champion:75}} **"HEY! WHO ARE YOU, WHAT ARE WE DOING HERE?"**

{{item:3194}} "I am an unknown. You are here to compete on the greatest game show on earth. You will all be split up into fifteen teams of eight. Well, seven for whoever's team that poor soul was on."

_**Everyone looks at Blood Moon Talon's headless body on the floor.**_

{{item:3194}} "You will all be crammed into an airplane and flown over an island. You are to jump out of the plane, land safely, collect loot and kill the other teams to win the grand prize. I have confiscated all of your items before you got here, so don't think about having an advantage."

{{champion:141}} "Things didn't turn out so well for the last guy that took Rhaast from me."

{{item:3194}} "That brings me to my final point. You all have a chip in your brain. It has taken away any special abilities or training you may have. No turning into a giant monster out there. Also, it will allow you to hear everything your teammates say and where they are at all times. Finally, it will let you see an ever-shrinking blue fog circle around you. If you are inside said blue fog, the chip will begin causing you excruciating pain, until it kills you. Any funny business and I can also just kill you. If you don't believe me, ask Blood Moon Talon. See you all when you wake back up."

{{champion:268}} "Wake up? What does he mean by-"

_**Everyone in the warehouse passes out.**_

****

{{champion:64}} **"GNARLY, WE HAVE TO GO!"**

{{champion:150}} _"Wakes up and notices the plane around him. The sound of its engines and the wind are deafening."_

{{champion:64}} **"WE HAVE TO JUMP, NOW!"**

{{champion:150}} **"ALRIGHT, I'M GOING!"**

_**They both jump out of the airplane.**_

{{champion:64}} "Alright, the other corporates are headed to those buildings over there."

{{champion:150}} "Wow, these chips work great, I can hear everything you say clearly."

{{champion:10}} "We all can. hurry up! I see others falling here that aren't friendly."

{{champion:64}} "Alright, pull your parachute."

{{champion:150}} "Parachute? Oh right, I don't want to go splat on the ground."
_"Fumbles around his back until he finds the rip-cord."_

{{champion:150}} "Hey, I see Mundo. **MUNDO, LOOK OUT, SOMEONES BEHIND YOU!**"

{{champion:36}} "Huh, you want piece of Corporate Mundo? Me give you piece."

{{champion:106}} "You bet I do. I may have been declawed but I can still knock you down."

{{champion:36}} "Me call this one the money maker."
_"Slams a fist right into Volibear's head."_

{{champion:106}} "Oooof, Hang on man, we can talk about this. You don't need to finish me."

{{champion:36}} "Me no have to do a lot of things that me do."
_"Proceeds to beat Volibear on the ground until he dies."_

{{champion:236}} **"AH, HELP! I'VE BEEN SHOT!"**

{{champion:240}} **"OH, NO ONE GOES AROUND SHOOTING MY COWORKER!"**

{{champion:236}} "No wait, he's got a gun and you only have a crowbar. Just help me up and we can take him."

{{champion:240}} **"DIE!!!!!!"**

{{champion:122}} **"WAIT, PLEASE! I NEED TO RELOAD!"**

_**Korporate Kled has killed Darius.**_

{{champion:240}} "Hahahaha, now I have a machine gun."

{{champion:10}} "That is the scariest thing I have ever heard."

{{champion:75}} "Come on Lucian, get up."

{{champion:150}} "Minutes in and so many have already been killed so horribly. Who would do this to people? Who would watch a show like this?"

_**Meanwhile:**_

{{champion:51}} "Alright, I got the popcorn."

{{champion:254}} "Children, it's starting!"

{{champion:1}} "Oh boy, a new season of my favorite show. Full of blood, crying, and chicken!"

#To be continued:
Anyone else think this rotation is a tad more messed up than normal?
There's one adc, and it's Kog'maw. Quinn hasn't been an adc in months and hardly anyone plays Ziggs adc. Meanwhile, there are 4 junglers and 6 midlaners.

Honestly, I think Ziggs might be the 2nd support, Kindred is supposed to be the 2nd ADC (they've put him there before). Although Ivern might be the 2nd support, but they've usually put him firmly Jungle before (and his 'supportness' is questionable).
Which is a bit too many "not really this position" all at once.

They (mostly) managed 2 per role for how many years, then they ADD more to the rotation and it goes downhill?

How hard would it be for 3 each Top/Jungle/Mid, 2 each ADC/Support, and the last slot is 'whatever'?
its been 9 months and wheres xayah
Skin sale AND free rotation for {{champion:203}} ? Maybe enough people will play them that I wont get flamed for locking them in champ select.

RIOT pls:

Can you put a small amount of heal on Lissandra's passive? That wouldn't affect her role as an initiator, and will fix her laning weakness. You guys tried to change her passive before, but I would appreciate if you guys worked more on that.
